resources.string:
Assignment description (CMPT 276 Homepage) 

Hello there! Welcome to the world of Pokémon! My name is Oak, people call me the Pokémon Prof! This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon! For some people, Pokémon are pets. Others use them for fights. Myself, I study Pokémon as a profession. And I need your help to find new species of Pokémon! 
To start searching for Pokémon, press "PLAY" on the main menu. This will take you to a field of tall grass. Press on a tile of tall grass to inspect it. You'll know a Pokémon when you see it pop up and hear its cry! If the tall grass has no Pokémon, a scan will show how many there are in that same row and column. Use this tool to boost your Pokémon catching skills! In the top left you'll see how many Pokémon you've caught and how many there are. You'll only win once you've caught em all! You can change the field size and number of Pokémon in the options menu. You can also clear all data from there. Good luck, trainer! 

Resources 
Landscape background 
 Sea background 
Oak portrait 
Ground tiles 
Grass sprites

Pokémon sprites 
Pokémon cries
